participant_1.background:
After I quit my job, I spent a lot of time listening to Fall Out Boy and thinking about what I wanted to do next.
i am a teacher.
I am not married, but I love planning weddings.
i enjoy reading.
I work long hours and play basketball to relieve stress.

participant_2.background:
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast!
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
I love to make art and crafts on the weekends!
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.

content.text: Doing well, how are you today?
Doing good! I just quit my job and I'm trying to figure out what I want to do next.
Oh wow, that's tough but also exciting! What made you want to quit?
I was really unhappy there and I felt like it was time for a change.
I get that, I've been there before. What are you thinking about doing next?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm interested in teaching.
That's great! I know a lot of people who enjoy teaching.
I've always loved working with kids and I think it would be a great fit for me.
I think so too! What kind of things do you like to do in your free time?
I love to read, play basketball, and go out with my friends.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read too, and I also enjoy going to the gym.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and escape from the real world.
